# Airtop node

Use the Airtop node to automate work in Airtop, and integrate Airtop with other applications. n8n has built-in support for a wide range of Airtop features, enabling you to control a cloud-based web browser for tasks like querying, scraping, and interacting with web pages.

On this page, you'll find a list of operations the Airtop node supports, and links to more resources.

///  note  | Credentials
Refer to [Airtop credentials](/integrations/builtin/credentials/airtop.md) for guidance on setting up authentication.
///


## Operations

* Session
    * Create session
    * Save profile on termination
    * Terminate session
* Window
    * Create a new browser window
    * Load URL
    * Take screenshot
    * Close window
* Extraction
    * Query page
    * Query page with pagination
    * Smart scrape page
* Interaction
    * Click an element
    * Hover on an element
    * Type


## Templates and examples

## Related resources

Refer to [Airtop's documentation](https://docs.airtop.ai/api-reference/airtop-api) for more information about the service.

--8<-- "_snippets/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/operation-not-supported.md"

Contact [Airtop's Support](https://docs.airtop.ai/guides/misc/support) for assistance or to create a feature request.

## Node reference

### Create a session and window

Create an Airtop browser session to get a **Session ID**, then use it to create a new browser window. After this, you can use any extraction or interaction operation.

### Extract content

Extract content from a web browser using these operations:

- **Query page**: Extract information from the current window.
- **Query page with pagination**: Extract information from pages with pagination or infinite scrolling.
- **Smart scrape page**: Get the window content as markdown.

Get JSON responses by using the **JSON Output Schema** parameter in query operations.

### Interacting with pages

Click, hover, or type on elements by describing the element you want to interact with.

### Terminate a session

End your session to save resources. Sessions are automatically terminated based on the **Idle Timeout** set in the **Create Session** operation or can be manually terminated using the **Terminate Session** operation.

properties_schema.name: profileName
properties_schema.description: The name of the Airtop profile to load or create

properties_schema.name: saveProfileOnTermination
properties_schema.description: Whether to automatically save the Airtop profile for this session upon termination

properties_schema.name: timeoutMinutes
properties_schema.description: Minutes to wait before the session is terminated due to inactivity

properties_schema.name: proxy
properties_schema.description: Choose how to configure the proxy for this session

options.name: None
options.description: No proxy will be used

options.name: Integrated

options.name: Proxy URL
options.description: Use a proxy URL to configure the proxy

properties_schema.name: proxyConfig
properties_schema.description: The Airtop-provided configuration to use for the proxy

options.name: country
options.description: The country to use for the proxy. Not all countries are guaranteed to provide a proxy. Learn more here.

options.name: Saint Helena, Ascension and Tristan Da Cunha
South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands
United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland
sticky
options.description: Whether to try to maintain the same IP address for the duration of the session. Airtop can guarantee that the same IP address will be available for up to a maximum of 30 minutes.

properties_schema.name: proxyUrl
properties_schema.description: The URL of the proxy to use

options.name: solveCaptcha
options.description: Whether to automatically solve captcha challenges

options.name: extensionIds
options.description: Comma-separated extension IDs from the Google Web Store to be loaded into the session. Learn more here.

properties_schema.displayName: Note: This operation is not needed if you enabled 'Save Profile' in the 'Create Session' operation

properties_schema.name: sessionId

options.name: Create a New Browser Window

properties_schema.name: sessionId

properties_schema.name: url

properties_schema.name: getLiveView
properties_schema.description: Whether to get the URL of the window's Live View

properties_schema.name: includeNavigationBar
properties_schema.description: Whether to include the navigation bar in the Live View. When enabled, the navigation bar will be visible allowing you to navigate between pages.

properties_schema.name: screenResolution
properties_schema.description: The screen resolution of the Live View. Setting a resolution will force the window to open at that specific size.

properties_schema.name: disableResize
properties_schema.description: Whether to disable the window from being resized in the Live View

options.name: waitUntil
options.description: Wait until the specified loading event occurs

options.name: Load
options.description: Wait until the page dom and its assets have loaded

options.name: DOM Content Loaded
options.description: Wait until the page DOM has loaded

options.name: Complete
options.description: Wait until all iframes in the page have loaded

options.name: No Wait
options.description: Do not wait for any loading event and it will return immediately

properties_schema.name: url
properties_schema.description: URL to load in the window

options.name: waitUntil
options.description: Wait until the specified loading event occurs. Defaults to 'Fully Loaded'.

options.name: Complete
options.description: Wait until the page and all it's iframes have loaded it's dom and assets

options.name: DOM Only Loaded
options.description: Wait until the dom has loaded

options.name: Fully Loaded
options.description: Wait until the page dom and it's assets have loaded

options.name: No Wait
options.description: Do not wait for any loading event and will return immediately

properties_schema.name: outputImageAsBinary

properties_schema.name: sessionId

properties_schema.name: windowId

properties_schema.name: elementDescription
properties_schema.description: A specific description of the element to execute the interaction on

properties_schema.name: scrollingMode
properties_schema.description: Choose the mode of scrolling

options.name: Automatic
options.description: Describe with natural language the element to scroll to

options.name: Manual
options.description: Define the direction and amount to scroll by

properties_schema.name: scrollToElement
properties_schema.description: A natural language description of the element to scroll to

properties_schema.name: scrollToEdge
properties_schema.description: The direction to scroll to. When 'Scroll By' is defined, 'Scroll To Edge' action will be executed first, then 'Scroll By' action.

properties_schema.name: scrollBy
properties_schema.description: The amount to scroll by. When 'Scroll To Edge' is defined, 'Scroll By' action will be executed after 'Scroll To Edge'.

options.name: scrollValues
options.description: The amount in pixels or percentage to scroll by

properties_schema.name: scrollWithin
properties_schema.description: Scroll within an element on the page

properties_schema.name: text
properties_schema.description: The text to type into the browser window

properties_schema.name: pressEnterKey
properties_schema.description: Whether to press the Enter key after typing the text

properties_schema.name: elementDescription
properties_schema.description: A specific description of the element to execute the interaction on

options.name: visualScope
options.description: Defines the strategy for visual analysis of the current window

options.name: Auto
options.description: Provides the simplest out-of-the-box experience for most web pages

options.name: Viewport
options.description: For analysis of the current browser view only

options.name: Page
options.description: For analysis of the entire page

options.name: Scan
options.description: For a full page analysis on sites that have compatibility issues with 'Page' mode

options.name: waitForNavigation
options.description: The condition to wait for the navigation to complete after an interaction (click, type or hover). Defaults to 'Fully Loaded'.
